original_title: Pan Asia Bank strengthens digital reach with new zone in Kiribathgoda
original_body_lines: Pan Asia Bank is pleased to open the newest digital zone in Kiribathgoda. Customers can now gain more access to technologically advanced banking services as a result of this development. The newest Digital Zone emphasizes the banks’ commitment to offering quality customer-oriented services that enhance the banking experience in Kiribathgoda.
